import React,{ useState } from 'react' import Menu from '../UpMovieItemMenu'; import { motion } from "framer-motion" const UpcomingMovie = () => { return (

Upcoming Matches

{/*
*/}
{ Menu.map((elem)=>{ return(
{elem.title}
{date}
  • {elem.quality}
  • {elem.duration} {elem.ratings}
) }) }
) } export default UpcomingMovie
